import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Main = () => { const [showLogin, setShowLogin] = useState(false); const [currentUser, setCurrentUser] = useState(null); const handleLoginClick = () => setShowLogin(true); const handleCloseLogin = () => setShowLogin(false); const handleLoginSuccess = (username) => setCurrentUser(username); return ( <>
